Frederick.Lake Linganore, Maryland:
Lake Linganore is a community in Frederick County, in the U.S. state of Maryland, located just outside New Market, Maryland.
The community consists of "villages" which are essentially neighborhoods. The community of villages is centered on a system of lakes, the centerpiece of which is Lake Linganore, a 210-acre (85 ha) reservoir built on Linganore Creek, and the largest privately owned lake in the state.
